news_header: Negotiations led to the termination of 7 employment relationships due to budget cuts.
news_text: The negotiations that began in the autumn of the EYT Society have concluded, resulting in the termination of 7 employment relationships and changes in several positions. Initially, it was estimated that 16 staff members would need to be reduced. Additionally, the organization will cut costs on its 24-hour hotline, affecting drug counselling shift work. These changes were prompted by the Finnish Government's decision to reduce subsidies to social and health organizations.
